title: Unit 15: Triple Integrals
content:
# Unit 15: Triple Integrals
Oh baby a triple

They're really similar to double integrals.

![60dddd6a.png](60dddd6a-kl2t950o.png)

![df287482.png](df287482-kl2t950p.png)


So it's a spicy Rienmann sum.

![c2ea2876.png](c2ea2876-kl2t950p.png)

And of course, we have the same laws for linearity and such.

![1d9eaf5a.png](1d9eaf5a-kl2t950n.png)

![cc960e86.png](cc960e86-kl2t950p.png)

![26bbff2f.png](26bbff2f-kl2t950n.png)

![756d8e30.png](756d8e30-kl2t950o.png)

for solving these integrals, we can try to approach it one dimension at a time.

![0792b160.png](0792b160-kl2t950n.png)

We can also transform the space, but that's really tricky:

![5ba96da9.png](5ba96da9-kl2t950o.png)

Here are some very handy transformations:

![2d35703a.png](2d35703a-kl2t950o.png)

![71f75f63.png](71f75f63-kl2t950o.png)

![48084cde.png](48084cde-kl2t950o.png)
